      • updatePreferences

        public boolean updatePreferences(java.lang.String userName,
                        java.lang.String preferenceName,
                        int value)
        Update the preferences Row in the DB when the user modify any value in preferences menu. This method receives the user name, the name of the preference (sonido, tiempo, rememberPass) and the value (0 is not active, 1 is active)
        Parameters:
        userName -
        preferenceName -
        value -
        Returns:
        boolean
